name: The Association of Lithuanian Chemical Industry Enterprises
membership:
Confederation of Lithuanian Industrialists (CLI)
European Chemical Industry Council (CEFIC)
goal: Assist members in achieving common goals working with the national and EU institutions. The areas of activities comprise environmental, safe working environment, chemical legislation, social dialog, competitiveness issues.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Environmental,
safe working environment,
chemical legislation,
social dialog,
competitiveness
legislation and initiatives.
